name: Crate Game
description:
This game is in development.There will be more future updates.

What's new-->Update-1(28 April'21)

1.I made the timer work and now if timer rolls then you lose.

2.I tried to work a bit more on  the visual part.

What's new-->Update-2(29 April'21)

1.I added more effects to the game.

2.There is now a very basic UI setup.

3.Minor bug fixes.

Also, if you have any suggestions regarding the game or any complaints and major bugs please comment so that I become aware about them.
